plot: A young actress believes she is auditioning for the movie adaptation of everyone's favorite erotic novel Fifty Shades of Grey. In reality, she is auditioning for something much, much different.
title: Fifty Grades of Shay
plot_es: A young actress believes she is auditioning for the movie adaptation of everyone's favorite erotic novel Fifty Shades of Grey. In reality, she is auditioning for something much, much different.
